summary: The nation's workers have a variety of work schedules—and some work long hours by choice or necessity. But there have been concerns about how long work hours affect workers' health. A 2022 law includes a provision for us to study trends in work hours. Among other things, we found that: Average U.S. work hours have stayed at around 38 to 39 hours per week since...
title: Work Hours and Health: Research Shows That Very Long Hours May Modestly Increase the Risk of Certain Health Outcomes
